translation.en: Hmm. Honey, nature's happy sauce.
translation.it: Il miele, la salsa felice della natura.

translation.en: You can drizzle it, you can pour it,
you can fill a tiny plastic bear with it and squeeze.
translation.it: riempire un orsetto di plastica e spremere.

translation.en: But what's all the buzz about honey?
translation.it: Ma che cos'ha di speciale il miele?

translation.en: Yeah, that's what's on the menu today at…
translation.it: Già, è quello che c'è nel menù di oggi.

translation.en: [Waffles and Mochi] ♪ Waffles and Mochi's Restaurant! ♪
-[bell chimes] -Oh, hello. Welcome.
Right this way, please. I've got a wonderful table for you.
translation.it: Da questa parte, per favore. Ho un tavolo meraviglioso per te.

translation.en: I'm Busy, the maître bee. [laughs]
Okay. A menu for you. [buzzes]
And a napkin. Excellent.
Bon appétit. [chuckles, gasps]
No straws?
Drink up!
Would you like that food to go?
Excellent. I'll just take that for you. [mumbles]
There you are. Ah! Enjoy! [buzzes]
Anybody else?
[sighs] I love my job.
That was the busiest our restaurant has ever been.
translation.it: Il ristorante non è mai stato così affollato.

translation.en: Hey, friends.
[all] Hey-o, Mrs. O.
What's cookin'?
I'm gonna go get the rest of your delivery.
translation.it: Vado a prendere il resto della consegna.

translation.en: Thanks so much, Danny.
Mochi, here you go.
Thank you.
What's in the basket, Mrs. O?
translation.it: Cosa c'è nel cestino, signora O?

translation.en: Oh, have I got some great stuff for your dinner menu tonight.
translation.it: Oh, ho delle ottime cose per il tuo menù di stasera.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Got a little eggplant, some peppers,
-lettuce, and cauliflower. -[Busy gasps]
Did you say cauliflower?
[laughs] Oh, boy.
Ah! Reminds me of when I was just a little bee back on the farm.
translation.it: Mi ricorda quando ero un'ape alla fattoria.

translation.en: -They grew cauliflower on the farm? -Oh, yes.
Such wonderful memories of a simpler time. [chuckles]
translation.it: Che bei ricordi di un tempo più semplice.

translation.en: Oh, wow.
It looks like you guys were pretty busy at the lunch service today.
translation.it: Sembra che siate stati impegnati al servizio del pranzo.

translation.en: -[Waffles] Yeah. -Sure were.
Oh, you should have seen us, Mrs. O.
Mochi, over here, was boiling and frying!
-[Waffles] Yeah. -Waffles was stirring and whisking.
translation.it: - Sì. - Waffles stava mescolando con la frusta.

translation.en: Danny, you were right by our side the whole time.
translation.it: Danny, eri sempre al nostro fianco.

translation.en: And, Yuki, you were serving up the customers super fast.
translation.it: E Yuki, servivi i clienti in modo super veloce.

translation.en: And Bella was announcing every order.
Like this.
I love that sound.
Anyone else who was super helpful?
translation.it: Qualcun altro è stato di grande aiuto?

translation.en: Oh! I almost forgot. Yes?
-The real hero of the day… -Oh. [chuckles]
…is Steve.
-[splutters] -He cleaned up all that spaghetti.
What? Oh, I was just hungry.
Oh, there's more on my face.
translation.it: Oh, ne ho ancora qualcuno in faccia.

translation.en: I… I'll be right back.
-[door locks] -He locked himself in the bathroom.
Was it something we said?
translation.it: È per qualcosa che abbiamo detto?

translation.en: I think it was something you didn't say, Waffles.
translation.it: Credo sia qualcosa che non hai detto, Waffles.

translation.en: What?
See, everyone was talking about how busy everyone else was
translation.it: Tutti parlavano di quanto fossero impegnati,

translation.en: except for Busy.
translation.it: ma nessuno ha parlato di Busy.

translation.en: -Oh, no. I feel awful. -[Danny] Oh.
What should we do?
I think you need to apologize and show him how much you appreciate him.
translation.it: Credo che tu debba scusarti e dimostrargli quanto lo apprezzi.

translation.en: When I wanna show somebody that I appreciate them,
translation.it: Quando voglio dimostrare a qualcuno che lo apprezzo

translation.en: I bring them something I know they'll really, really love.
[gasps] Like puppies?
-Oh, well, we're talking about Busy. -[Waffles] Oh.
translation.it: Oh, beh, stiamo parlando di Busy.

translation.en: -Oh. Honey! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm.
[all] Yeah!
We should cook something with honey for Busy.
translation.it: Dovremmo cucinare qualcosa con il miele per Busy.

translation.en: I think that would be a lovely idea.
But we don't know anything about honey.
translation.it: Ma non sappiamo niente del miele.

translation.en: Well, the first thing you can do is visit a honey farm.
translation.it: Beh, la prima cosa che puoi fare è visitare una fattoria di miele.

translation.en: -That's a great idea! -[meeps]
And I happen to have the card of a great one right here.
translation.it: E io ho il biglietto da visita di un ottimo posto.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Mrs. O.
Glad to be of service.
-I will leave you to it. Good luck. -[chuckles]
translation.it: Vi lascio. In bocca al lupo.

translation.en: [all] Thank you.
Bye.
All right, we know what we must do.
To the magic cart!
Our food mission, should we choose to eat it,
learn all about honey, so we can make something super delicious
translation.it: è imparare tutto sul miele, per preparare un piatto delizioso

translation.en: to cheer up Busy.
translation.it: e tirare su di morale Busy.

translation.en: Look, there's the honey farm!
translation.it: Guardate, ecco la fattoria del miele!

translation.en: -Let's go, Mochi. -[meeps]
-Another perfect landing! -[Mochi meeps in agreement]
-Wow! -[meeps]
Look at this honey farm, Mochi.
-There's so many bees here! -[Mochi mimics buzzing]
translation.it: Ci sono così tante api qui.

translation.en: -Hello. -[beekeepers] Hello.
Hi. Do you know anything about bees?
-Yes. -Yeah, we know a lot about bees.
translation.it: - Sì. - Sì, sappiamo molte cose sulle api.

translation.en: So get your suits on and come here.
-Okay. Come on, Mochi. Let's go. -[Mochi meeps]
-Hi. -Hello.
Hello. My name is Waffles, and this is my best friend Mochi.
translation.it: Ciao. Mi chiamo Waffles e questo è il mio migliore amico Mochi.

translation.en: -I’m Gavin. -And I am Grady.
translation.it: - Sono Gavin. - E io sono Grady.

translation.en: Gavin and Grady. So, where are we?
translation.it: Gavin e Grady. Allora, dove siamo?

translation.en: We’re at Hapa Honey Farm.
Well, we have a little bit of a dilemma.
We wanna cook a meal for our friend Busy.
translation.it: Vogliamo cucinare per il nostro amico Busy.

translation.en: He’s a bee, so we figured we could cook something with honey.
translation.it: È un'ape, quindi abbiamo pensato di cucinare qualcosa con il miele.

translation.en: Could you help us find honey?
translation.it: Puoi aiutarci a trovare il miele?

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. We'll help you. -Thank you.
[Gavin] When you puff smoke on the bees, it calms them down.
translation.it: Con il fumo le api si calmano.

translation.en: So what happens inside of a beehive?
translation.it: Cosa succede all'interno di un alveare?

translation.en: [Gavin] In a beehive, there are three types of bees.
translation.it: In un alveare, ci sono tre tipi di api.

translation.en: The queen will be inside, um, laying eggs.
translation.it: La regina sarà dentro a deporre le uova.

translation.en: -There are drones. -[Grady] The drones have bigger eyes.
translation.it: Ci sono i droni. I droni hanno occhi più grandi.

translation.en: [Gavin] And then the worker bees are out getting pollen and nectar to make honey.
translation.it: E poi le api operaie che prendono polline e nettare per fare il miele.

translation.en: So bees don't just like honey,
translation.it: Quindi alle api non piace solo il miele,

translation.en: -they make honey? -Yep.
The bees have to work together, and they all have different jobs.
translation.it: Le api devono lavorare insieme e hanno tutte compiti diversi.

translation.en: -Just like we do at the restaurant. -[meeps]
[Waffles] So, there’s a queen inside?
[Gavin] Yep, the queen is the big bee who lays all the eggs.
translation.it: Sì, la regina è l'ape che depone tutte le uova.

translation.en: Sounds like a busy job.
And I’m looking for the queen, which I just found.
translation.it: E sto cercando la regina, che ho appena trovato.

translation.en: -The bee with the white dot is the queen. -[Waffles] Hello.
translation.it: L'ape con il punto bianco è la regina.

translation.en: [Grady] My dad marks them with that so we know it's the queen.
translation.it: Mio padre la marchia così sappiamo che è la regina.

translation.en: Hello, Your Majesty.
[Gavin] Okay, Waffles and Mochi, I'm gonna show what the honey looks like.
translation.it: Ok, Waffles e Mochi, vi mostro il miele.

translation.en: -[Waffles] Look, Mochi, that’s honey. -[Mochi meeps]
That’s a good question, Mochi.
How can the bees communicate with each other?
The scout bees go out early to look for all the forage,
translation.it: Le api scout escono presto per cercare il foraggio,

translation.en: like nectar and pollen.
And they do a little dance in front of the other bees
translation.it: E fanno una danza davanti alle altre api

translation.en: to tell them where they are.
We love to dance. What kind of dance?
translation.it: Adoro ballare. Che tipo di danza?

translation.en: It's called a waggle dance.
♪ A waggle dance A waggle dance ♪
translation.it: Una waggle dance Una waggle dance

translation.en: ♪ A waggle dance, waggle dance Waga-ga-ga da ♪
So anyways, bees are really hard workers, and they're always busy.
translation.it: Comunque, le api lavorano sodo e sono sempre impegnate.

translation.en: Bees are responsible for about a third of the food that you put in your mouth.
translation.it: Le api sono responsabili di circa un terzo del cibo che mangiamo.

translation.en: A third of the food that we put in our mouth?
translation.it: Un terzo del cibo che mangiamo?

translation.en: -Yeah. -That's a big part of our restaurant.
translation.it: - Sì. - Sono importanti per il ristorante.

translation.en: Unbelievable!
Wow. It sounds like bees are super important.
translation.it: Wow. Sembra che le api siano importantissime.

translation.en: Why don’t you come to our tasting table to pick out honey for your friend?
translation.it: Perché non provi degli assaggi per scegliere il miele per il tuo amico?

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheers]
Come on, let’s go. Chase me, Mochi!
-Wow, look at all these jars of honey. -[Mochi meeps]
translation.it: Guarda tutti questi barattoli di miele.

translation.en: What is honey made from?
translation.it: Di cosa è fatto il miele?

translation.en: Honey, we call it bee barf.
-"Bee barf?" -[meeps]
-So, a bee gets nectar from a flower… -[Waffles] Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Un'ape prende il nettare da un fiore

translation.en: …and then spits it into another bee’s mouth,
translation.it: e poi lo sputa in bocca a un'altra ape,

translation.en: and that bee spits it into another bee's mouth,
translation.it: e quell'ape lo sputa in bocca a un'altra ape,

translation.en: and it continues on for a while.
-[groans] -[Gavin] And it slowly becomes honey,
and they eventually put it into comb.
translation.it: e alla fine lo mettono nel favo.

translation.en: Depending on where the bees go to forage makes different kinds of honey.
translation.it: A seconda di dove vanno le api, si ottengono diversi tipi di miele.

translation.en: So if it’s orange blossom honey,
translation.it: Quindi, se è miele di fiori d'arancio,

translation.en: the bees are in a great big field of oranges.
translation.it: le api sono in un grande campo di arance.

translation.en: And we have a forest honey,
which is the sap that leaks out of the trees,
translation.it: quando la linfa che fuoriesce dagli alberi

translation.en: and then aphids and other bugs eat the sticky, sweet sap.
translation.it: viene mangiata da afidi e altri insetti.

translation.en: -They poop out the sugar. -[yelps]
-[man] Yeah. -Is poo-poo honey?
Then the bees take it back to their hive,
and they barf into each other's mouth, and then it becomes forest honey.
translation.it: lo riportano al loro alveare e diventa miele di bosco.

translation.en: [Waffles] But where is your sense of adventure?
translation.it: Sì, Mochi, ma dov'è il tuo senso dell'avventura?

translation.en: I would love to try it.
You can.
Hello, honey.
-It's delicious. -[Mochi] Mm.
-Do you like it, Mochi? -Mmm. [meeps]
Forest honey is also one of the most nutritious honey there is.
translation.it: Il miele di bosco è anche uno dei più nutrienti.

translation.en: Forest honey is even more amazing than regular honey.
translation.it: Il miele di bosco è ancora più buono del miele normale.

translation.en: Yeah.
I can taste the nutrition.
Or am I tasting the poop?
-Poop. You're tasting the poop. -The nutrition. Nutrition.
translation.it: - Cacca. Stai assaggiando la cacca. - La nutrizione. Nutrizione.

translation.en: Well, we have the honey. But how do we decide what to make with it?
translation.it: Beh, abbiamo il miele. Ma come decidiamo cosa farne?

translation.en: Maybe let’s go talk to a chef.
translation.it: Magari andiamo a parlare con uno chef.

translation.en: -A chef. Yeah. -[both laugh]
-[phone rings] -Oh. Sorry, gotta take this.
-[Mochi meeps] -Hello.
How's it going, you two?
Good. We have honey. We're about to talk to a chef.
translation.it: Bene. Abbiamo il miele. Stiamo per parlare con uno chef.

translation.en: Great! Things are getting a little better here. Busy stopped crying.
translation.it: Fantastico. Le cose vanno un po' meglio. Busy ha smesso di piangere.

translation.en: [Busy] No. I was just taking a little break!
translation.it: No. Mi stavo solo prendendo una pausa!

translation.en: -You two better hurry. -We will.
Okay, Moch, let's learn how to cook with honey.
translation.it: Ok, Moch, impariamo a cucinare con il miele.

translation.en: -Are you guys in line for the bathroom? -[Busy gasps] I'm in here, Steven!
translation.it: Siete in fila per il bagno? Sono qui, Steven!

translation.en: -Oh. -I'll ju… I'll just use another one.
Hi. Hi.
-How are you? -Hi, guys.
Chef Samin. What are you doing here?
translation.it: Chef Samin. Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: Oh, I'm making a delicious thing called honey confetti.
translation.it: Sto facendo una cosa deliziosa chiamata coriandoli al miele.

translation.en: -Wanna help? Okay. -[Waffles] Yeah!
So, we’re gonna put all sorts of delicious seeds in the honey,
translation.it: Quindi, metteremo tutti i semi deliziosi nel miele

translation.en: and you can drizzle it on top of almost any dish.
translation.it: e potrete aggiungerlo a quasi tutti i piatti.

translation.en: -Will you help mix the seed mixture? -Sure.
translation.it: Mi aiutate a mescolare la miscela di semi? Ok, ecco dei semi di sesamo gialli tostati.

translation.en: [Samin] Okay, here’s some toasted yellow sesame seeds.
translation.it: Ok, ecco dei semi di sesamo gialli tostati.

translation.en: Here's some toasted pumpkin seeds, toasted poppy seeds.
translation.it: Ecco dei semi di zucca tostati, semi di papavero tostati.

translation.en: This is black sesame.
And this is the sunflower. You can add all of those into there.
translation.it: E questi sono di girasole. Puoi aggiungerli tutti.

translation.en: And now, there’s just one ingredient left to add.
translation.it: E ora c'è solo un ingrediente da aggiungere.

translation.en: -Honey. -Honey!
Who's gonna help?
-Me. -Me.
-Let’s add this whole jar. -[Grady] Whoa!
[Samin] Now, we’re gonna make our dish.
-These are some sweet potatoes. -[Waffles] Oh, that color.
translation.it: Queste sono delle patate dolci. Oh, che bel colore.

translation.en: [Samin] Aren’t they so pretty?
And then we’re gonna do our honey confetti.
translation.it: E poi faremo i nostri coriandoli al miele.

translation.en: -[kids] Mmm! -Confetti, confetti, confetti!
[Samin] And these are marigolds.
Everyone ready to taste some sweet potato?
translation.it: Pronti ad assaggiare la patata dolce?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah! Okay.
Wait a minute. Samin, there's flowers on this.
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Samin, ci sono dei fiori.

translation.en: 'Course, there are flowers. They're edible.
translation.it: Certo, ci sono i fiori. Sono commestibili.

translation.en: The flowers aren't edible.
translation.it: Ma i fiori non sono commestibili.

translation.en: Some flowers are edible.
We eat flowers all the time.
-Mm? -Things like broccoli.
[screams] Broccoli is a flower?
-Artichokes. -[meeps]
And cauliflower.
Cauliflower is a… flower?
You’re right, Mochi!
Busy said cauliflower was his favorite thing when he was a little bee.
translation.it: Busy diceva che il cavolfiore era la cosa che preferiva da piccolo.

translation.en: You can make this dish with cauliflower instead of sweet potatoes.
translation.it: Puoi fare questo piatto con il cavolfiore al posto delle patate dolci.

translation.en: I’m sorry, Samin, we gotta go and get cooking.
translation.it: Scusa, Samin, dobbiamo andare a cucinare.

translation.en: Go get cookin'!
Come on, Mochi!
-[all] Bye. -Come on, we gotta go!
-Mochi, are you ready to get cooking? -[meeps excitedly]
All right, time for Waffle speed!
translation.it: Va bene, è ora della velocità di Waffle!

translation.en: -Aprons on! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm.
-Strings tied! -[Mochi meeps]
-Hats on! Let’s go! -[meeps excitedly]
♪ It’s time to hit the kitchen ♪
translation.it: È ora di andare in cucina

translation.en: ♪ And complete our mission ♪
[all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
translation.it: Cosa bolle in pentola? Cosa bolle in pentola?

translation.en: ♪ Let’s make a special dish That’s tasty and delish! ♪
translation.it: Facciamo un piatto speciale Che sia gustoso e delizioso

translation.en: [all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
translation.it: Cosa bolle in pentola? Cosa bolle in pentola?

translation.en: -[Mochi flutters lips] Mm? -Hey, Moch. Are you ready to make confetti honey cauliflower?
translation.it: Ehi, Moch, sei pronto a fare i coriandoli al cavolfiore?

translation.en: -[meeps] -All right, let's go.
-[all] ♪ One ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Slice a cauliflower ♪
♪ Brush it with oil and roast it ♪
-[all] ♪ Two ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Toast the seeds ♪
translation.it: - Due! - Tostare i semi e mescolarli con il miele

translation.en: -♪ And mix them with honey ♪ -[all] ♪ Three ♪
translation.it: - Due! - Tostare i semi e mescolarli con il miele - Tre! - Impiattate su un letto di yogurt

translation.en: [Waffles] ♪ Plate it up On a bed of yogurt ♪
translation.it: - Tre! - Impiattate su un letto di yogurt

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Four ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Drizzle the honey confetti ♪
translation.it: - Quattro! - Spruzzate i coriandoli al miele

translation.en: ♪ And add some flowers ♪
translation.it: E aggiungete dei fiori Ed ecco fatto È cavolfiore con coriandoli al miele!

translation.en: ♪ And there you have it, it’s confetti honey cauliflower! ♪
translation.it: Ed ecco fatto È cavolfiore con coriandoli al miele!

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Honey cauliflower ♪ -[bell dings]
Order up.
Do… Do you whiff what I whiff?
What is that enchanting smell?
It's this!
What's going on here?
[chuckles] A fresh floral bouquet?
Cooked cauliflower, like, back on the farm?
Drizzled with… [gasps] …confetti honey?
I feel so loved.
[screams] It's delicious!
-[all] Hurray! -[Busy laughs]
Today, Mochi and I found out that honey wouldn’t exist without bees.
translation.it: Oggi, Mochi e io abbiamo scoperto che il miele non esisterebbe senza le api.

translation.en: They work so hard making it.
Just like you do here at the restaurant.
Oh, we appreciate you, Busy, and we’re sorry.
translation.it: Oh, ti ringraziamo, Busy, e ci dispiace.

translation.en: That’s the sweetest thing anyone has ever said to me.
translation.it: È la cosa più carina che mi abbiano mai detto. E ora vorrei dire quanto siete importanti per me.

translation.en: And now, I would like to say how much you all mean to me.
translation.it: E ora vorrei dire quanto siete importanti per me.

translation.en: Ooh, Busy’s gonna give us a speech.
No, Danny. Bees communicate through the power of dance.
translation.it: No, Danny. Le api comunicano attraverso il potere della danza.

translation.en: -Huh? -Hit it!
-[Yuki] Okay. All right. -[Mochi giggles]
Yeah, Busy, okay.
-Shake what your queen gave you. -Yeah!
translation.it: Scuoti quello che ti ha dato la tua regina.

translation.en: Come on, shake your stingers, everybody! [grunts]
-[all] Go, Busy. Go, Busy. -That's right. Come on.
-Show me what you got! -[all] Go, Busy!
translation.it: - Mostrami cosa sai fare! - Vai, Busy!
